title: I got a 14 day suspension, here's my log
body:
So, I was in a game of URF when a Syndra decided to start being racist to me and calling me "%%%%". Here is my response in which I was given a 14 day ban, I wasn't "toxic" at least I don't think so, the Syndra was also making fun of me for having higher education. I may have egged him on but I don't see any bad toxic calls on my part?

Game 1
NeiKKeD: lol y u mad in urf?
NeiKKeD: y sah mad?
NeiKKeD: aww, y sah mad?
NeiKKeD: ?
NeiKKeD: ?
NeiKKeD: hahahahahah
NeiKKeD: ohh so you don't have higher education yourself?
NeiKKeD: is that why you are so mad?
NeiKKeD: wait
NeiKKeD: but
NeiKKeD: do you yourself, NOT have higher education?
NeiKKeD: is that why you are mad?
NeiKKeD: because you parents couldn't afford it or something?
NeiKKeD: 1337 you don't have higher education street
NeiKKeD: so you're getting MAD at a 12 year old?
NeiKKeD: mad embarassing
NeiKKeD: lol a 12 year old mad you mad
NeiKKeD: hahahah
NeiKKeD: but, answer the question
NeiKKeD: are you MAD at a 12 year old?
NeiKKeD: mad at a 12 year old?
NeiKKeD: you upset?
NeiKKeD: because a 12 year old has higher education than yourself?
NeiKKeD: I thought I was a %%%%?
NeiKKeD: you're like a girl
NeiKKeD: can't make up her mind
NeiKKeD: so Syndra. what am I? 
NeiKKeD: a %%%%?
NeiKKeD: or abo?
NeiKKeD: i'm unsure
NeiKKeD: please prof oak
NeiKKeD: help me
NeiKKeD: am I a girl or boy?
NeiKKeD: you mad?
NeiKKeD: answer the question
NeiKKeD: that's a lie
NeiKKeD: you said I was a %%%%
NeiKKeD: right about being bad at Syndra?
NeiKKeD: yes?
NeiKKeD: brownie? or %%%%?
NeiKKeD: is your name cory?
NeiKKeD: you're so mad lol
NeiKKeD: i
NeiKKeD: don't
NeiKKeD: think
NeiKKeD: so
NeiKKeD: also, it's i'll*
NeiKKeD: not ill

replies.body: The system is busted right now. Mute all and unbind chat. Its the only way.

You used the word "Mad" so obnoxiously. Also, dont called others bad. You've been in bronze for 4years straight :/

Ban well deserved.
everyone uses any word obnoxiously, just because it's the word "mad"? i've been in bronze because i'm not that skilled, are you saying that ALL bronze players deserve a ban?

Let me recap why you got banned incase the chat log baffle you. 

The fire got fan due to your constant attempt to aggitate the other person with "you mad, mad? mad? so mad?" and then for some reason you telling him he should'nt be ofended by a 12 year old child "am guesing you are telling him you're 12?". 

Afterward you claim that the other person is being indecisive, and therefor he is a girl? Also, you bring the name "corey" into the equation? what does that name has to do with anything?

All this with an extra large serving of mad pour ontop; I'll say this again your banned is well desever. Dont call others people bad when you are bronze; At your tier, you're the running jokes of the league community.

You made good points there Demon, but you completely undermined them by calling this person bronze, you are using something, perhaps out of this persons control, against them and mocking them for it. You are holding something against them which they may not be able to change. If you are going to answer their question, keep it polite and straight forward, and do not bring your personal opinion or mind set into the answer, I am not trying to be a white knight here, just my opinion on your answer there mate.

As to the actual question this ban was not deserved, a chat mute would have been better fitted as a punishment here, although in my opinion, you should not of been punished, others say worse things and get away with it, but in saying that, you were being obnoxious a large degree, so learn when to stop typing.

incorrect. he got banned for whatever word he used that was censored. it seems it was "racist" however if we are to believe these chat logs (no reason not to) it seems the bot (as expected) did not pick up the context that he was apparently repeating what someone else called him.

boo hoo lets just ban everyone for being obnoxious. 

everyone just has to conform to your preferred personality huh? if you find somebody obnoxious or annoying or unpleasant etc than you just have to deal with it. the answer is not "ban him".

like seriously, it's getting to the point that you just can't say anything (like what is happening irl) without being persecuted by someone (usually a lefty) because it doesn't align with their beliefs/views/opinions. might as well just get rid of chat entirely then.

the irony of all this is that the persecution is usually more toxic than anything else, as displayed by your posts in this thread. ie the grief you're giving this person for being bronze.

The converstaion above, the OP isnt being judge on his political correctness, he uses racist words "a-b-o" and the N word to incite further arguement from the other guy.

Yea i called him bronze? am i lying? That just his ranking atm. If he feel ashame of being bronze, ok, My apology. 

If he is as thicked skin as you claim people should be, then there is no need for you to even call me out on that point. But since you did take notice of it; i guess you do have feeling and want to protect it huh? Isnt that the same as those you try to call out on for unable to deal with it? 

If this was IRL and depend on who you hang out with or the area that you are in; You're gonna start a fight using poor choice of words. Dont think it ok to say all that behind a screen. Even prisoners and gangsters know respect when talking to each others; It just warriors online think is fine. So take a step back and think. If the Guy ABOVE, talks like this in prison, DO YOU think, he is gonna be ok? Carry this attitude outside of his screen and spam mad, mad at others, see how long he'll last. 

The only reason people like you think they should be above the social etiquette, is because you are hidding where it safe.

you missed the point of the post entirely. can't say i'm surprised though.

i called you out for being hypocritical and the irony of your persecution. i did not call for you to be banned/silenced/punished because you expressed yourself in a way i didn't like, like how you're saying "i find the way this person types to be obnoxious, therefore he should be banned". there is a big difference. you do have every right to disagree/challenge/dislike what someone says. i know, this concept may be difficult for some.

i mean, i am not even going to comment on the rest of your drivel about spamming mad and not lasting long in prison. some of the dumbest analogies and comparisons i have ever seen, showcasing even further that you actually have no clue about what anybody is talking about, let alone are capable of even interpreting the OPs chat logs. you legitimately can't understand the context of his logs and the actual reason that he was banned. rather worrying actually. but hey people like you just like to ignore facts.

The rules are set in TOS, you agreed to it when you start playing. Again, you failed to grasp the basic of breaking rules. You're playing their game, so follow their rules? simple enough? 

You can disagree with it, vote with your feet, leave the game, dont come back; Lets see if there is enough of the banned people to make a different. Riot, like any other company is pleasing the larger part of their communities; You can cry about your banned all you want, because the majority voted for you to be ousted.

Dont be a tourist and claim others cultural treatment doesnt accommodate yours. He wouldnt be reported if he watch his words. But did he? nope, he was pushing his luck from start to end. Again, you are not forced to play this game. If you find their treatment not to your liking, leave?

what are you even talking about? again it's like you didn't understand a single word of what you read. instead of actually replying to any points made you, again, just blurt out some irrelevant nonsense.

i legit have lower IQ from participating in a conversation with you.

Haha, the partern is the same aint it. You dont understand what was said, and you blur out irrelevant nonsense. So incase you cant read between the line. Am talking about this game and their banning system is set on rules, dont cry and ask why you got banned when you break those rules. 

Your IQ isnt high enough for it to be any lower. Dont talk to me any more if it gonna harm you ok? poor thing :S

riot can ban you for any or no reason. don't see how this is relevant to the conversation. again, you seem to have missed the point of it all entirely. 

1. we were talking about you saying he deserved a ban because you find him obnoxious and you, multiple times, have tried to insinuate "typing the word 'mad' obnoxiously" is part of the reason he received an instant 14 day suspension. you got called out for your persecution of wanting someone banned because they type in a manner you don't like while at the same time giving this person shit for his rank.
2. i pointed out that the reason he actually got an instant 14 day suspension is because of the specific word/s he used. being obnoxious does not (at least not yet) get you an instant 14 day suspension.
3. the issue is that the bot ignores context, and so do you apparently. if you honestly think those logs are worthy of an instant 14 day suspension, then i hope you 1 day get one for similar reason. eg for saying something like "dont call me a %%%got". you used the word so you deserve it right?

nice "no u r" retort.

You are making the assumption that it was a bot? If that is all you have to go on then alrighty. You stick to that. As a matter of fact. Why DONT you! go to sub reddit forum for league. And plead your cases. Post chat log there. Represent all these people that got banned "unfairly" by bots. 

Go and make it count; Where people can hear you the most. GOOD LUCK MAN.

yes it is a fact that it is a bot. have you been living under a rock? or just ignoring facts as usual? riot has made it clear that it is a bot that picks up certain words (if reported) and then escalates (skips punishment tiers) to 14 day suspensions. that is what all the fuss is about on the forums.

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/

There, go on. Let your case be hear. Obviously the banned people gonna make a fuss after they got banned. But hey, if it was unfair like you said. Go on reddit and post the cases to the 1.2 mil users, and collectively get riot's attention.

hahaha a Bronzie getting banned and then QQing.

Learn to shut your mouth and play the game and it wont happen.

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Clarence,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=ETKrEs1B,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-01-01T19:51:18.726+0000)
>
> hahaha a Bronzie getting banned and then QQing.
> 
> Learn to shut your mouth and play the game and it wont happen.

another insightful contribution.
in line 7 you said "higher education". you're lucky you didnt get perma'd for that.
This guys a legend leave him alone
You were being a dickhead but at most you should of gotten a chat ban. Either side could of just muted the other player and the situation would of been resolved.
